title: Moments in time
creator_credit: Ron Saunders, Ron Lowe, South Australian Film Corporation and Film Makers Australia
brief_description: Museums are revealed as “time machines”, freezing moments in time so that places and things we couldn’t normally see are made available to us, to look at and to study. Their role in the study of Australian ecology and their other services are also highlighted. Commentary by Steve Curtis.
creator_credit_for_label: Ron Saunders, Ron Lowe, South Australian Film Corporation and Film Makers Australia
